Title: Cruse Control .Net WP7 Client using Caliburn Micro
Description: This is a Cruise Control .NET Windows Phone 7 client. My aim it to bring funcionaly of CCTray to WP7 using Live Tiles and Server Notifications.

Project Description
This is a Cruise Control .NET Windows Phone 7 client. My aim it to bring funcionaly of CCTray to WP7 using Live Tiles and Server Notifications.

Project Goal

Intent is to create a Windows Phone 7 client and monitoring & notification service for Cruise Control.Net http://confluence.public.thoughtworks.org/display/CCNET/Welcome+to+CruiseControl.NET.
